title: Instructional Design Strategies for MOOC Quality Assessment and Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Online Learning Environments and Instructional Design Concepts
context.additional_context: For prospective/current corporate language instructors, operated in PBL format with digital device support

learning_goals: Identify and apply five criteria for evaluating the educational quality of MOOCs.
Develop three instructional design strategies in project format to enhance learner support.
Propose improvements for business-oriented MOOCs using a structured evaluation tool (rubric).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
